factionUnitType.description: Single faction unit type (deprecated - use factionUnitTypes array instead)

factionUnitTypes.description: Faction unit type identifiers to include (matches ANY). Examples: Custom58 (MLA) or Custom1 (Legion)

mods.description: Mod identifiers that layer on base game in priority order (empty for base game only)

author.description: Faction or profile author (auto-detected from primary mod if not specified)

description.description: Brief description of the faction (auto-detected from primary mod if not specified)

version.description: Semantic version (auto-detected from primary mod if not specified)

dateCreated.description: ISO 8601 date (auto-detected from primary mod if not specified)

build.description: PA game build number (auto-detected from primary mod if not specified)

backgroundImage.description: Resource path to background image within mod sources (e.g. /ui/mods/my_mod/img/bg.png)
